review: Good-bye cable. With all one can access on Apple TV and Amazon, supplemented by a subscription to Sling, the cord can be cut. All you need is those three services and a good wi-fi connection.
author: John F. Barber

review: Simply Works!  It has 2 plugs one for the wall adapter and one HDMI. I have an adaptor for my tv as I have several HDMI things plugged in and I have had no problems getting this stick to work.  The remote is very simple to learn and works perfectly. the remote is made of all plastic, no rubber parts anywhere. It is very lightweight, weighing about as much as a cigarette lighter.  The stick looks very much like a flash drive, however since it is plugged into the wall to remember who you are, it isn't exactly portable.  I dont move mine so this is not an issue for me. I bought it to replace older video game systems that were not able to keep up with my streaming Netflix and Amazon Prime tv shows, and it works perfectly. Never had a over heating issue or glitches of any kind.  It took me about 5 min to set up and watch the tutorial video, and another 5 to sign into all of subscriptions.  Super Simple.
author: Northwest
